title: 'The Tsar of Love and Techno' links tales of people banished from memory
text:
Published By: Pittsburgh Post: Books - Today 
In his new collection of linked stories, “The Tsar of Love and Techno,” Anthony Marra shows readers how people disappear forever in Leni...
